reviews.text: There's no better way to love yourself and care for your skin than with daily organic jojoba oil. Love this stuff! Keeps your skin hydrated, glowing, and youthful! It absorbs well and you don't need very much.

reviews.productTitle: Handcraft Blends USDA Organic Jojoba Oil - Cold-Pressed 8 Fl Oz - 100% Pure and Natural - Premium Grade Carrier Oil for Skin and Hair - Hair and Body - Massage - Hexane-Free
reviews.text: Why would one put a premium grade carrier oil in a plastic bottle instead of glass? It is in an amber bottle which helps preserve its quality once bottled, but only glass containers can be used to not contaminate an organic oil. Plastic is obviously a much cheaper option but then this should no longer be labeled a premium oil. Because it is in a plastic bottle, I would not consider this a premium grade oil and thus I have given it 3 stars instead of 5 because of its reduced quality. I would not recommend.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2025
reviews.title: In plastic, not glass bottle.

reviews.text: it's a fabulous oil! it works wonders in my skincare and haircare routines-boasts a fresh scent,offers great value for its size. I also bought it for a DIY hair mask, and it's been incredible! my hair stays less oily for longer,feels thicker,brings out my natural curls more vividly,and has this silky smoothness i adore. planning to use it in my nose,chin and nail too! My only grip is the plastic bottle,it doesn't look upscale,though that's likely why it's so budget-frienfly,it would be great if the quality and price could be a little better.
